findings.rationale: The perpetual nature of confidentiality obligations may expose a party to indefinite risk, limiting their ability to use information freely in the future.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: An unlimited indemnification clause may result in significant financial exposure for one party, potentially leading to unmanageable liabilities.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit.

findings.rationale: The absence of liability limitations can lead to excessive financial liabilities for either party, especially in the event of a breach.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The exclusive ownership of work product by one party may deter collaboration and lead to disputes regarding rights to jointly developed materials.
findings.evidence_quote: All work product and deliverables created hereunder shall be owned exclusively by Company A.

findings.rationale: The provision for recovery of attorneys' fees may discourage parties from pursuing legitimate claims due to fear of financial repercussions.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
